segments.text: Besides novels , any other types literary works that you indulgence .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have you read anything else besides literature ?

segments.text: Certainly I have . I like to read books on vary subjects , and i can read everything I can get my hands on in my spare time . I don't want to idle away and waste my time .

segments.text: I agree . People who don't read are no better often people who can't read . I also agree that books are like food for the mind .
